title: Personalized Communication Strategy Design Using Learning Analytics

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital literacy and intermediate-level expertise in social sciences
context.additional_context: A formative assessment-centered project-based environment with provided digital devices, establishing a technological infrastructure enabling real-time feedback and resource linkage through learning analytics.

learning_goals: Learners can design three types of personalized feedback messages based on analysis of learning activity data
Learners can connect educational resources (online lectures, case study materials, etc.) appropriate for each project phase to a recommendation system based on learning analytics
Learners can develop timely notification strategies based on assessment schedules and learning progress rates to improve learner engagement by over 20%
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
